org.apache.lucene.search.highlight.Fragmenter

Packages that use Fragmenter
Package
Description
org.apache.lucene.search.highlight
Highlighting search terms.

  • Uses of Fragmenter in org.apache.lucene.search.highlight

    Classes in org.apache.lucene.search.highlight that implement Fragmenter
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    NullFragmenter
    Fragmenter implementation which does not fragment the text.
    class 
    SimpleFragmenter
    Fragmenter implementation which breaks text up into same-size fragments with no concerns over spotting sentence boundaries.
    class 
    SimpleSpanFragmenter
    Fragmenter implementation which breaks text up into same-size fragments but does not split up Spans.
